it.polito.pd2.WF
Interface ActionStatusReader

public interface ActionStatusReader

An interface for accessing information about the status of an action instance. The execution status includes the following information:

  • if the execution of this action instance has already been taken over and by who;
  • if the execution of this action instance terminated and when.

Method Summary
 String getActionName()
          Gives the name of the action this execution instance refers to.
 Actor getActor()
          Gives the actor who has taken over the execution of this action instance.
 Calendar getTerminationTime()
          Gives the time when the execution of this action instance terminated.
 boolean isTakenInCharge()
          Specifies if the execution of this action instance has already been taken over.
 boolean isTerminated()
          Specifies if the execution of this action instance is terminated.
 

Method Detail

getActionName

String getActionName()
Gives the name of the action this execution instance refers to.

Returns:
the name of the action this execution refers to (a string made of alphanumeric characters only, where the first character is alphabetic)

isTakenInCharge

boolean isTakenInCharge()
Specifies if the execution of this action instance has already been taken over.

Returns:
true if this action execution instance has already been taken over

isTerminated

boolean isTerminated()
Specifies if the execution of this action instance is terminated.

Returns:
true if the execution of this action instance is terminated

getActor

Actor getActor()
Gives the actor who has taken over the execution of this action instance.

Returns:
the actor who has taken over the execution of this action instance

getTerminationTime

Calendar getTerminationTime()
Gives the time when the execution of this action instance terminated.

Returns:
a Calendar set to the time when the execution of this action instance terminated
